content: An idiot admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity.
author: Terry A. Davis

content: I’ll leave tomorrow’s problems to tomorrow’s me
author: Saitama

content: Fifteen seconds. That’s all it takes to completely change everything about a person.
author: Colleen Hoover - It Ends with us

content: The deeper the darkness, The more dazzling the light shines
author: Midoriya - MHA season 1 ep 12

content: If you wish to be happy for one hour, get drunk. If you wish to be happy for three days, get married. If you wish to be happy for a month, kill your pig and eat it. If you wish to be happy forever, learn to fish.
author: Chinese Proverb

content: Your life would be very empty if you had nothing to regret.
author: Anonymous (from fortune)

content: Nothing makes a person more productive than the last minute.
author: Anonymous (from fortune)

content: What doesn't inspire fear should be feared the most.
author: Karma Akabane (Assassination Classroom)

content: There are only two reason a person feels the desire to teach something:either to pass on his successes,or warn about his failures.
author: Korosensei (Assassination Classroom)

content: I love solitude not lonliness
Freedom is an illusion
Even If my hardwork betrays me I will not betray my hardwork
author: Klaus (black clover E77)

content: King is some one who can climb out of the gap between good and evil
author: code geass r1 episode 15 Cheering Mao . Before op

content: You do not lie when you make a vow in your heart I don't want to bore you, but there's nobody else around for me to bore.
author: fortune people

content: Some of the things that live the longest in peoples' memories never really happened.
author: fortune people

content: A real sin is something you can never atone for.
author: Ban (The seven deadly sins episode 7: the touching reunion)

content: Whenever you find that you are on the side of the majority, it is time to  reform.
author: Mark Twain

content: I don't hate you. I'm just not necessarily excited about *your existense*
author: Anonymous

content: A man slave to gold, holds a whip, and he beats the slave he bought with that gold as if to claim he is the master. He just doesn't see it for himself. Every human being is a slave to something
author: Akseladd (Vinland saga S1E08)

content: Like rowing a boat we enter the future backwards. All we see are the scenes of the past, and no one can see the views of tomorrow
author: Vinland saga S1E13 (before opening text)

content: Of all men's miseries, the bitterest is this: to know so much and have control over nothing.
author: Herodotus

content: Another man's evil does not make you good
author: Daredevil

content: The three principal virtues of a programmer are Laziness, Impatience and Hubris
author: Perl

content: The important thing is not to avert my eyes. I realised that so many things only seemed scary because I kept averting my eyes.
author: Ishigami

content: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering
When we lose our principles, we invite chaos.
author: Mr Robot

content: When you see a good move, look for a better one.
author: Mr Robot

content: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.
author: Miyamoto Mushashi

content: The ability to stay cheerful in the face of fools is an important skill
author: Robert Greene (The 33 Strategies of War )

content: When you do plank you relalize how long life is
author: A youtube comment

content: When a man can’t find a deep sense of meaning, they distract themselves with pleasure.
author: Viktor Frankl
